caseTitle: Pakistan Refinery Ltd, Karachi v. Barrett Hodgson Pakistan (Pvt) Ltd & others
tagline: A perusal of the impugned judgment would reveal that the Division Bench of the High Court did not state the points of determination, decision thereon and reasons therefor and such judgment cannot be said to have been rendered in substantial compliance with Rule 31 of Order XLI, C.P.C.
